summary: A grand jury subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding an unnamed recipient to appear before the grand jury on July 31, 2019, to testify and produce documents regarding alleged violations of federal sex trafficking and conspiracy statutes. The document includes an advice of rights and a request to keep the subpoena confidential.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: Issued the grand jury subpoena as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York, requesting confidentiality of the investigation.

events.title: Grand Jury Appearance
events.description: The subpoena commands the recipient to appear before the grand jury at the United States Courthouse in Manhattan to testify and produce documents regarding alleged violations of federal sex trafficking and conspiracy laws.

events.title: Subpoena Issuance
events.description: The grand jury subpoena was issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, initiating a formal demand for testimony and documents.

locations: United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, Manhattan, New York, New York
The Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The subpoena is part of a federal grand jury investigation into alleged violations of 18 U.S.C. §§ 1591 (sex trafficking), 2421 (transportation for prostitution), 2422 (coercion and enticement), 2423 (transportation of minors), and 371 (conspiracy).
The recipient is commanded to appear on July 31, 2019, at 10:00 a.m. at the U.S. Courthouse in Manhattan and to produce unspecified items, with failure to comply constituting contempt of court.
The U.S. Attorney's Office requests that the recipient voluntarily refrain from disclosing the existence of the subpoena to any third party to preserve the confidentiality of the investigation.
The document includes an 'Advice of Rights' section informing the recipient of their right against self-incrimination and right to counsel.
